oai_dc:dc.dc:title: GCC0012: Faculty retreat, 1968-09-04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photo from a faculty retreat that took place the weekend of September 4, 1968. First row: Larry Barnes, John Stork, Malcolm Wormley, William Vincent, Angelo Francesca, Dr. Stuart Steiner, William McCleary, Bruce Lindsey, James Perkins, Frank Clark, Robert Trantham. Second row: Almeta George, Marjorie Young Gautieri, Lorraine Fischer, Douglas Evans, David Peters, Donald Ketcham, John “Jerry” VonHold, Bernard Marcus, Bonnie Burke, William Hauser, Helle Leetmaa, Douglas Cowles, Paul Schulte, Richard Shirey, Michael Stoll. Third row: Robert Fussell, John Carli, George Cruden, Joseph Sullivan, Carl Lewis, Eva Young, Maria Peter, Gloria Nowaczyk, Maxine Long, Francis Semmens, Dolores Chiocco, Carol Wittlinger, Anthony Cory, Harry Welshofer, Ronald Cole. Fourth row: Dr. Alfred C. O’Connell, Anthony Zambito, Michael Brick, Lawrence Levy, David Gnage, Peter Lindstrom.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: GCC0005: First Genesee Community College Board of Trustees, 1966
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In July 1966, the first Genesee Community College Board of Trustees met with Dr. John A. Mears, Assistant Dean for two-year colleges of the State University system to discuss the initial action to be taken for establishment of the college. From left, front, are Mrs. Robert S. Jenks, Dr. Mears, former Le Roy Supervisor Robert G. Fussell and Mrs. Almeta George. Standing, from left, are William A. Setchel, Francis M. Robinson of Le Roy, Neil T. Burns, Michael J. Ryan, Principal A. Warren Dayton of Alexander and Anthony T. Zambito of Elba.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community colleges--New York (State)--History
